channel.title: I need some help
channel.description: I need some help. I just downloaded Fr33scape source.. usually when i try to add something like i want to change the wise old man outside the bank to say X Ub3rh4x0r is or isnt online....isted of Freescape is or isnt online...how would i do that...i have outhers to if yall could help me with this one..U can coem to my server ip is 5.135.198.100 to see it and talk to me...please do taht if u can!!! ;D :confused: :P :( :mad: ;)

I got it on my own ty tho…

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @Pluse_Of_The_Maggots Pluse Of The Maggots
item.description:
@Pluse_Of_The_Maggots wrote:

It would be under NPC handler and search for npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Thug Life")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Thug life is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Thug life is offline!"; } Then change it to

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("xub3rh4x0r")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "xub3rh4x0r is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "xub3rh4x0r is offline!"; }

Read full topic
